notes.title: API Integration Tasks
notes.description: Integrate the News API endpoints into the application, handle loading and error states properly, and refactor API calls into a reusable service layer.

notes.title: UI Improvements
notes.description: Improve spacing, typography, and card layout. Add hover effects to news cards and ensure category chips wrap correctly on smaller screens.

notes.title: Weekly Goals
notes.description: Set clear weekly goals, break them into smaller tasks, and review progress every Sunday to stay focused and avoid burnout.
